target_audience: Tech-savvy millennials aged 25-40 interested in outdoor activities

products.name: Professional Winter Jacket
products.prompt: A high-quality professional winter jacket in deep navy blue, shown on a clean white background, studio lighting, product photography style, sleek design with visible insulation
products.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, busy background, people, text, watermark

products.name: Elite Thermal Gloves
products.prompt: Premium black thermal gloves with touch-screen compatible fingertips, displayed on white background, detailed texture visible, studio product photography
products.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, hands wearing gloves, people, text

products.name: Insulated Winter Boots
products.prompt: Rugged insulated winter boots in tan/brown leather, side view on white background, professional product photography, high detail, waterproof construction visible
products.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, feet wearing boots, people, outdoor setting, text
